Description: THE NATIONAL GOVERNORS ASSOCIATION CENTER FOR BEST PRACTICES NGA SOLUTIONS WILL LAUNCH A NEW PROJECT WITH THE DEPARTMENT OF DEFENSE'S OFFICE OF ECONOMIC ADJUSTMENT OEA THROUGH THIS COOPERATIVE AGREEMENT. THE PURPOSE OF THE PROJECT IS TO PROVIDE GOVERNORS AND STATE GOVERNMENTS WITH GUIDANCE ON THEIR ROLE IN NATIONAL DEFENSE. NGA SOLUTIONS WILL TAKE THE INFORMATION PRESENTED IN OEA'S DEFENSE SPENDING BY STATE REPORT AND HELP GOVERNORS AND STATES TO CREATE AND IMPLEMENT STRATEGIC ACTION PLANS IN SUPPORT OF THE NATIONAL DEFENSE MISSION. THROUGH THIS PROJECT, NGA SOLUTIONS WILL INCREASE STATES UNDERSTANDING OF NATIONAL DEFENSE AND HOW THEY CAN ENHANCE THE DOD MISSION. THIS MAY BE THROUGH BETTER ASSISTING MILITARY COMMUNITIES IN STATES OR IMPLEMENTING SMARTER APPROACHES WITH THE DEFENSE INDUSTRY. THIS PROJECT WILL HOLD A SERIES OF FOUR REGIONAL WORKSHOPS THAT BRING TOGETHER GOVERNOR OFFICES, SENIOR STATE OFFICIALS, THE DEPARTMENT OF DEFENSE, AND NATIONAL DEFENSE EXPERTS. THE WORKSHOPS WILL ALLOW GOVERNORS OFFICES AND STATES TO LEARN BEST PRACTICES AND GIVE THEM OPPORTUNITY TO CONDUCT STRATEGIC PLANNING BASED ON THAT EDUCATION. POTENTIAL POLICY OUTCOMES MAY INCLUDE DRAFTING EXECUTIVE ORDERS AND LEGISLATION, LAUNCHING STATEWIDE PROGRAMS, AND OR IMPLEMENTING OTHER POLICY INITIATIVES. NGA SOLUTIONS AND OEA WILL ALSO RELEASE A SERIES OF REPORTS WHICH WILL CAPTURE IMPORTANT INITIATIVES AND LESSONS LEARNED ON THE STATE ROLE IN NATIONAL DEFENSE. ALTOGETHER, THESE REPORTS AND TECHNICAL ASSISTANCE WILL SUPPORT GOVERNORS AND STATES IN THEIR EFFORTS TO IMPLEMENT ACTION STEPS AND ACHIEVE MEASURABLE POLICY OUTCOMES.

THIS COOPERATIVE AGREEMENT WILL DEVELOP, TEST AND CARRY OUT QUANTITATIVE AND QUALITATIVE METHODOLOGIES TO HELP OFFICE OF ECONOMIC ADJUSTMENT INDUSTRY RESILIENCE GRANTEES MORE EFFECTIVELY ASSESS, EVALUATE AND REPORT THE FULL EFFECT OF THEIR PROJECTS. RESEARCH FINDINGS WILL PRIMARILY HELP CURRENT GRANTEES ADJUST THEIR PROJECTS TO ACHIEVE BETTER OUTCOMES AND SECONDARILY INFORM THE DESIGN OF OFFICE OF ECONOMIC ADJUSTMENT PROGRAM OF FINANCIAL AND TECHNICAL ASSISTANCE. THE AWARDEE WILL EMPLOY A COMBINATION OF DESCRIPTIVE ANALYSIS, QUANTITATIVE RESEARCH, AND EVIDENCE BASED EVALUATION TO DEMONSTRATE THE IMPACT THAT THE INDUSTRY RESILIENCE PROGRAM HAS HAD ON SUPPLY CHAIN RESILIENCY, CYBER RESILIENCY, AND READINESS IN THE STATES AND REGIONS THAT HAVE RECEIVED FUNDING. ASSESS WAYS TO IMPROVE THE IMPACTS THAT PROGRAM RECIPIENTS HAVE IN ACHIEVING THE DEPARTMENT OF DEFENSE OBJECTIVES AND HAVE MORE INFORMATION TO GUIDE NEW GRANTEES IN WORKING MORE EFFECTIVELY WITH THE PRIVATE SECTOR AND CAPTURE THE INSTITUTIONAL KNOWLEDGE TO ENHANCE FUTURE INDUSTRIAL RESILIENCY ACTIVITIES REQUIRED BY THE DEPARTMENT OF DEFENSE. THE PROGRAM PROVIDES TECHNICAL RESOURCES FOR COMMUNITIES AS FORCE MULTIPLIERS WORKING IN PARTNERSHIP WITH THE PRIVATE SECTOR TO IMPROVE EFFICIENCIES, ENSURE READINESS AND FOSTER NEW TECHNOLOGIES IN THE PRODUCTION OF GOODS AND SERVICES THAT SUPPORT THE WARFIGHTER.
DEFENSE INDUSTRY ADJUSTMENT PROGRAM EVALUATION PHASE 3
AGILE MANUFACTURING FOR HIGH-VALUE, LOW VOLUME PRODUCTION
